mapper.select: select ent.stock_code, ent.cn_name,ent.is_state_hold,ent.total_asset,ent.opt_income,ent.opt_profit,ent.opt_profit_on_income,ent.liab_ratio,ent.gross_profit_margin ,ent.stock_type from stock_list_potential_ma ma inner join stock_feature_all ent on ma.list_stock_code = ent.stock_code where ma.xsb_stock_code = #{stockCode} and ma.is_xsb_ma = 1

select ent.stock_code, ent.cn_name,ent.is_state_hold,ent.total_asset,ent.opt_income,ent.opt_profit,ent.opt_profit_on_income,ent.liab_ratio,ent.gross_profit_margin ,ent.stock_type from stock_list_potential_ma ma inner join stock_feature_all ent on ma.xsb_stock_code = ent.stock_code where ma.list_stock_code = #{stockCode} and ma.is_list_ma = 1

select ent.stock_code, ent.cn_name,ent.is_state_hold,ent.total_asset,ent.opt_income,ent.opt_profit,ent.opt_profit_on_income,ent.liab_ratio,ent.gross_profit_margin ,ent.stock_type from stock_xsb_list_matching ma inner join stock_feature_all ent on ma.list_stock_code = ent.stock_code where ma.xsb_stock_code = #{stockCode} and ma.is_xsb_matching = 1

select ent.stock_code, ent.cn_name,ent.is_state_hold,ent.total_asset,ent.opt_income,ent.opt_profit,ent.opt_profit_on_income,ent.liab_ratio,ent.gross_profit_margin ,ent.stock_type from stock_xsb_list_matching ma inner join stock_feature_all ent on ma.xsb_stock_code = ent.stock_code where ma.list_stock_code = #{stockCode} and ma.is_list_matching = 1
mapper.insert: insert into stock_feature_all (stock_code, cn_name, stock_type, csrc_industry, em_industry, topic_industry, prov, is_dev, chairman_cum_ceo, is_state_hold, top1_hold, top10_hold, share_conc, share_balance, person_hold, ceo_education, ceo_age, pe, pb, ps, total_stock, market_cap, net_profit, opt_profit_growth, net_profit_on_asset, opt_profit, total_asset, profit, profit_growth, total_asset_growth, holder_equity_on_liab, liab_ratio, opt_income, asset_turnover, net_profit_on_income, opt_profit_on_income, net_profit_margin, ma_fee_on_income, trade_cycle, days_in_inventory, interest_liab_on_capital, current_asset_ratio, tangible_asset_ratio, roa, non_current_asset_ratio, tangible_asset_on_liab, current_liab_ratio, gross_profit_margin, opt_cost_on_income, roic, opt_income_growth, roe) values (#{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{csrcIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicIndustry,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDev,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{chairmanCumCeo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isStateHold,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{top1Hold,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{top10Hold,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shareConc,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shareBalance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personHold,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ceoEducation,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ceoAge,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pe,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ps,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalStock,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{marketCap,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netProfit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{optProfitGrowth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netProfitOnAsset,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{optProfit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalAsset,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{profit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{profitGrowth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalAssetGrowth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{holderEquityOnLiab,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{liabRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{optIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{assetTurnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netProfitOnIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{optProfitOnIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netProfitMargin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maFeeOnIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tradeCycle,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{daysInInventory,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tangibleAssetOnLiab,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{currentLiabRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{grossProfitMargin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{optCostOnIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roic,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{optIncomeGrowth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roe,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

stock_code,
